title: Inventory Platform
excerpt: Headless CMS + admin for managing stock and sales.
description: Full-featured inventory management with roles, CSV import, reporting and export. Admin dashboards, webhooks, and role-based access.

title: Marketplace
excerpt: Multi-vendor marketplace with payments and seller dashboards.
description: Custom checkout flows, product management and shipping integrations with seller analytics and commission rules.

title: Travel Companion App
excerpt: Cross-platform app for trip planning & bookings.
description: Flutter-based travel app with offline maps, itinerary sync and booking integrations.

title: Field Workforce App
excerpt: Enterprise app for field teams with offline sync.
description: Kotlin Android app with task sync, photo evidence, and background sync for low-connectivity regions.

title: Corporate Site — Dinesh Industries
excerpt: Clean corporate site focused on services & lead gen.
description: SEO-first informative website with service pages, case studies and contact lead capture. Lightweight and easy to update.

title: Portfolio — Creative Studio
excerpt: Showcase site with case studies and gallery.
description: High-performance portfolio with animated case studies, lazy-loaded media and CMS-powered case entries.

title: SaaS Landing & Signup Flow
excerpt: Conversion-focused landing and signup funnel for a SaaS product.
description: Optimised landing with A/B-ready hero, pricing table and secure signup flow integrated with Stripe.

title: Retail E-commerce Store
excerpt: Shopify + custom storefront for a retail brand.
description: Headless storefront, custom product configurator, and a smooth mobile checkout experience with analytics & marketing integrations.

title: UI/UX Redesign — FinTech App
excerpt: Design system and usability improvements for a finance app.
description: Full redesign: research, wireframes, high-fidelity prototypes and a component library for consistent handoff to devs.

title: Onboarding Flow Optimization
excerpt: Usability study and redesign that increased activation.
description: Remote usability tests, iterations and a new onboarding microcopy + flow that improved activation metrics.
